blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

summary: Q, R, and W for Koda.
question: Q, R, and W for Koda.
answer:
Q uirk - Some random ability they have that’s beneficial in a relationship.

He’s a great listener, which comes in handy whenever his s/o needs to rant about something. whether a subject has got them in a tiff or you got in an argument with someone close, Kouda is always ready to lend an ear.

R omance - How romantic are they? What would they do to make their s/o happy? Cliché or rather creative?

When it comes to romance, he is rather adorable. He will have animals run up to his s/o with little love notes, and will make cute bento boxes with food in the shape of hearts and other lovey dovey symbols.

W ild Card - A random Fluff Headcanon.

Whenever his s/o surprises him with a kiss, he will make a small squeak. The first time that it happened, he couldn’t stop blushing for the rest of the day. Teasing him about it only serves to make it worse, the blush making it’s way down to his shoulders.

blog.name: mha-imagines-for-you
blog.title: my hero academia imagines for you
blog.description: Request open Rules:nothing about pregnacy or kids, soul mate au are not my cup  of tea sorry(rules can be added later )

title: Kitsune shoto todoroki x reader
body:
The girl in the youkai world

End

Please like,reblog or comment to help a writer out



It’s hurt, it really hurts…what even happened, and why do i feel so off

“Shoto she is waking up!”

Is that izuku voice..why does it burn,yet i feel so cold

“(name)…i wonder how she is going to react, you think she will hate me?”

“Don’t be silly shoto,you did what had to be done, hey look her eyes are open.”

“(name)…” he said taking your hand

“Huh, oh im fine…”

“That’s  relife to know.” he said

“Wait… you can understand me?”

“Oh, yes i can.”

“…how?”

“Well you see.” shoto said before pointing besides you, you looked down, and saw two fluffy tails, your eyes went wide and you grabbed it and low and behold it was attached to you.

“I’m sorry i didn’t ask first, but if i didnt you would of died, you have been out for two days.”

“What…happen to me exactly, what did you do?”

“Oh nothing much, but gave you some of my life force, soul sharing and well you are a kitsune, a young one.” he said, you looked over and two of his tails were missing

“But but…how?”

“YOu came here from another plan of existence and that is what you are questioning.”

“Haha right, it’s just a lot to take in.”

“I know, im sorry, but since this is what you are now, you won’t be able to go back.”

“…why are you apologizing?” you said, he looked up “I didn’t want to go back even if this didn’t happen.” you said holding up one of your tails.”

“I have to ask, why didn’t you want to go back.”

“Well you said you were my family right.”

“…yes, you still are.” he said, you gave him a smile, seeing izuku sitting behind him, you smiled

“But i have to know, what happen to that other kitsune.”

“That is my bastard of a father, after you stabbed him in the back, he through you off, and well izuku came out and kicked him out.”

“That was your father, i stabbed your dad.”

“Don’t worry about him, it will take a lot more than that to take him down.”

“You sure he won’t come back to enact revenge on me?”

“If he steps on my property again, im calling the police.”

“There police here?”

“Yes.”
“OH….”

“Hey you two, i hate to interrupt, but shoto you need to realize she isn’t human anymore…”

“I know that izuku.”

“What does me not being human have to do with anything?”
“Well it means you don’t really need me around anymore.”
“….your kicking me out?” you said

“NO, no it just means that you can leave and start your own life,here.”

“Hey what part about being my family don’t you understand, you really think i’m leaving you after all this.” you said

“SO you want to still live here.”

“If you let me, i like this house,a dn i like being around you, and your fluffy ears.” you said reaching for them

“(n-name) please.” he said

“But they are so soft i can’t help it.”

“You have your own.” he said

“But i like yours better, one is red, and one is white.” you said

“Well yours are pretty cute as well.”

“I think i’m gonna leave now, call me if you need anything.” izuku said standing up and leaving

“Bye bunny boy.” you said waving.

“Thank you for staying with me.” he said

“NO thank you for letting me stay,i never really had a family before.” you said

“I haven’t had the best experience with it, so i may not be the best at providing it.”

“I’m sure we will figure it out, shoto.”

“I’m sure we will (name).” he said
body_abstract:
The girl in the youkai world

End

Please like,reblog or comment to help a writer out

End

blog.description: REQUESTS CLOSED! // heyo, user's my name and writings my game! check the rules before requesting! for mobile users, check out the 'links' tag!

summary: I'm not sure if this will help but maybe some VampireDenki x reader antics? I could see him jokingly flirting and I think that...
question: I'm not sure if this will help but maybe some VampireDenki x reader antics? I could see him jokingly flirting and I think that would be funny. I really love your writing and appreciate the fact that you write for us!!! Have a good day!
answer:
honest to god i have thought about vampire denki before i am so glad you requested this 

vampire!denki headcanons

  • i see denki as the type of vampire who tries to be very cool and mysterious, with just enough edginess to make himself feel like he’s playing the role perfectly. he goes kinda all out, he even gets the cape and everything. is he could, he’d get sparkles to throw around just to add to the entire thing. in his mind he’s some suave creature of the night
  • but, denki, sweet sweet denki, is a goober at heart. he tries his best to be cool as hell but it either ends up backfiring or it just highlights the fact that hes a lowkey tryhard
  • one example would be him going all out on a villain, and by the end of it he’s clearly exhausted but he just brushes his shoulder, chuckles, and says, “too easy”. between heaving breaths, of course. its so easy to tell that hes tired but he doesnt wanna admit it lmaooo
  • flirting is in his blood even if he’s not as great at it as he thinks he is. vampire denki is bolder, but still ultimately dorky. he flirts with you by making teasing remarks about how he can smell your blood, how he can hear your heart beating faster in your chest. 
  • “oh? your hearts racing suddenly. could it be… me?” 
  • his biggest failure ever was when he tried to literally sweep you off your feet, tipping you back so he could tauntingly ask to suck your blood, but he straight up dropped you onto the floor. he couldn’t look you in the eyes for like a week after that lol 
  • he flirts with you at every single chance he can get, even if it’s just a quick quip to make you flustered. they’re usually corny but when he’s good, he’s good.
  • vampires are undead arent they? for the sake of this, lets say yes. undead are cold! his hands are always freezing, which sucks for you because he has a tendency to try and touch you under the ruse of ‘trying to get warm’. he even tried to touch your boob once, saying, “im trying to touch your warm heart” but you knew better lmao
  • you clocked him one and once more, he couldnt meet your eyes for another week. vampire denki may be testy but he’s also a big baby so if you put your foot down he stops quickly
  • he doesn’t say this one out loud, or if he does he plays it off like a joke, but he really does want to suck your blood. he really can hear your blood pumping through your veins sometimes and it sorta drives him mad but he knows there really isnt anything he can do about it. he doesnt wanna hurt you, and he worries if he gets a taste he wont be able to stop himself. 
  • tragic

honest to god i have thought about vampire denki before i am so glad you requested this 

vampire!denki headcanons

  • i see denki as the type of vampire who tries to be very cool and mysterious, with just enough edginess to make himself feel like he’s playing the role perfectly. he goes kinda all out, he even gets the cape and everything. is he could, he’d get sparkles to throw around just to add to the entire thing. in his mind he’s some suave creature of the night
  • but, denki, sweet sweet denki, is a goober at heart. he tries his best to be cool as hell but it either ends up backfiring or it just highlights the fact that hes a lowkey tryhard
  • one example would be him going all out on a villain, and by the end of it he’s clearly exhausted but he just brushes his shoulder, chuckles, and says, “too easy”. between heaving breaths, of course. its so easy to tell that hes tired but he doesnt wanna admit it lmaooo
  • flirting is in his blood even if he’s not as great at it as he thinks he is. vampire denki is bolder, but still ultimately dorky. he flirts with you by making teasing remarks about how he can smell your blood, how he can hear your heart beating faster in your chest. 
  • “oh? your hearts racing suddenly. could it be… me?” 
  • his biggest failure ever was when he tried to literally sweep you off your feet, tipping you back so he could tauntingly ask to suck your blood, but he straight up dropped you onto the floor. he couldn’t look you in the eyes for like a week after that lol 
  • he flirts with you at every single chance he can get, even if it’s just a quick quip to make you flustered. they’re usually corny but when he’s good, he’s good.
  • vampires are undead arent they? for the sake of this, lets say yes. undead are cold! his hands are always freezing, which sucks for you because he has a tendency to try and touch you under the ruse of ‘trying to get warm’. he even tried to touch your boob once, saying, “im trying to touch your warm heart” but you knew better lmao
  • you clocked him one and once more, he couldnt meet your eyes for another week. vampire denki may be testy but he’s also a big baby so if you put your foot down he stops quickly
  • he doesn’t say this one out loud, or if he does he plays it off like a joke, but he really does want to suck your blood. he really can hear your blood pumping through your veins sometimes and it sorta drives him mad but he knows there really isnt anything he can do about it. he doesnt wanna hurt you, and he worries if he gets a taste he wont be able to stop himself. 
  • tragic

summary: w, r, k for iida! and don't push yourself I know finals are TERRIBLE!! so I wish you so much luck for that
question: w, r, k for iida! and don't push yourself I know finals are TERRIBLE!! so I wish you so much luck for that
answer:
W ild Card - A random Fluff Headcanon.

He will make up any excuse he can to give you breakfast in bed. From it being your xx day anniversary together, to saying that it’s random act of kindness day. Of course, his s/o isn’t complaining about it.

R omance - How romantic are they? What would they do to make their s/o happy? Cliché or rather creative?

He is both cliche and creative in his romanticism, learning what he knows of it through reading and published sources. Given that he is a certifiable rich boy, he’ll gift his s/o with only the highest quality chocolates, the best teddy bears, and the nicest restaurants and movie theaters.

K iss - Are they a good kisser? What was the first kiss like?

Iida isn’t all that good. The first kiss was quite pathetic in all honesty, given how unfamiliar he is with romance, but as his relationship progresses, he gets better at it.

blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary: Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Character(s): Midoriya Hisashi, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Izuku Warnings: Rape for alternate choice...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Character(s): Midoriya Hisashi, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Izuku
Warnings: Rape for alternate choice though it could be for first sentence given any probable lack of consent in some cases?

Prompt: Hisashi is a womanizer and Izuku has a lot of half-siblings out in the world. Alternatively; Hisashi is a villain that attacks women in their homes.

- kunnskat on Ao3

blog.name: xxvillain-deku
blog.title: Deku is the name of a villain
blog.description: Hehe, did you miss me Kacchan?

summary:
Shigaraki: Take him out of town and finish the job now! 
Villain Deku: What about dinner? 
Shigaraki: Deku, this is kind of...
body:
Shigaraki: Take him out of town and finish the job now!

Villain Deku: What about dinner?

Shigaraki: Deku, this is kind of important.

Villain Deku: How about dessert?

Shigaraki: …Well I suppose there’s time for dessert…

Villain Deku: And coffee!?

Shigaraki: Alright, a quick cup of coffee...then TAKE HIM OUT OF TOWN AND FINISH THE JOB!!

title: 72 HOURS
description:
by wayfindr

Everyone has their secrets, and the students of UA are not different. When the dormitories are taken over by a villain, who’s perturbing form of entertainment revolves around watching his victims spiral into chaos, the students are forced to participate in a series of unsettling and directionless games. Lies come boiling to the surface, secrets are spilled from lips, confessions are made in dark corridors, and blood is spilled on hardwood floors.

Whether or not they make it out alive, the students of UA will never be the same.

Words: 185, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/F, M/M
  • Characters: Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki, Shinsou Hitoshi, Kaminari Denki, Midoriya Izuku, Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Class 1-B (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Shouto, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Eri (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki/Shinsou Hitoshi, Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo
  • Additional Tags: Drama, Romance, Violence, Heavy Angst, Hurt/Comfort, Shinsou Hitoshi is in Class 1-B, Alternate Universe - Mineta Minoru Doesn’t Exist, Secret Relationship
